contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of December, 2007, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, the order of the Superior Court is VACATED, and the matter is REMANDED to the Superior Court for re-consideration in light of Commonwealth v. Holmes, 593 Pa. 601, 933 A.2d 57 (2007) and Commonwealth v. Walls, 592 Pa. 557, 926 A.2d 957 (2007).
